message.content:
- she is the same age as I was when I was 6 plus the number of years since then until now.

Let's break this down:
- In 1948, I was born and turned 6 in 1954.
- My sister was half my age, so she was 3 years old when I turned 6.
- If we start counting from 1954, we get: 1954 + 62 = 2016 (current year).

So, my sister is now 2016 - 1954 = 62 years old.
